svg.style: background: #ffffff; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); color-scheme: light dark;

#959595);strokeWidth=2;flowAnimation=1;" parent="1" source="juqY6IJ5wfRkjjHgBMh2-8" target="juqY6IJ5wfRkjjHgBMh2-17" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-215" y="320" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="-165" y="270" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="juqY6IJ5wfRkjjHgBMh2-26" value="<div style="text-align: center;"><span style="background-color: transparent;"><font style="color: light-dark(rgb(0, 153, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); font-size: 16px;"><b>Stateless Benefits :&nbsp;</b></font></span></div><div><ul><li>Easy horizontal scaling -add./remove instances anytime</li><li>No data loss on failure - any instance can handle any request</li><li>Simple deployment - rolling updates without state migration</li></ul></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeColor=light-dark(#6dc994, #ededed);align=left;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-490" y="386" width="420" height="104" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="juqY6IJ5wfRkjjHgBMh2-28" value="<font style="font-size: 20px; color: rgb(255, 128, 0);"><b>Stateful Services</b></font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="370" y="210" width="190" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="juqY6IJ5wfRkjjHgBMh2-29" value="<font style="font-size: 16px; color: rgb(255, 255, 255);"><b>Feature Store</b></font><div><font style="color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">Service</font></div><div><font style="color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">Maintains&nbsp;<span style="background-color: transparent;">Cache</span></font></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=light-dark(#f39c12, id="juqY6IJ5wfRkjjHgBMh2-33" value="<font style="color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-size: 16px;"><b>Persistent&nbsp;</b></font><div><font style="color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-size: 16px;"><b>Database</b></font></div><div><font style="color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">State Backup</font></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=light-dark(#34495e, #ededed);" parent="1" id="juqY6IJ5wfRkjjHgBMh2-35" value="<font style="color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">User A session</font>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=light-dark(#9b59b6, #ededed);strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="160" y="307" width="90" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="juqY6IJ5wfRkjjHgBMh2-41" value="<font style="color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">User A session</font>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=light-dark(#9b59b6, #ededed);strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="160" y="354" width="90" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uGHY-M5jHRp5VtFisGd5-1" value="<div style="text-align: center;"><span style="background-color: transparent;"><font style="font-size: 20px; color: light-dark(rgb(255, 128, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));"><b>Stateful Challenges</b></font></span></div><div><ul><li>Complex scaling - state must be migrated or replicated</li><li>Recovery complexity - state must be restored after failures</li><li>Consistency challenges - multiple instances need synchronized state</li></ul></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="177" y="400" width="520" height="106" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="uGHY-M5jHRp5VtFisGd5-6" value=""
